short_summary: Rail transportation services are required to facilitate rail movements of oversized military equipment.
description: To facilitate rail movements of oversized military equipment such as vehicles, trailers and containers in support of the Exercise MAPLE RESOLVE 23
full_summary:
---------------

### Invitation to Qualify - Rail Transportation Services

#### Tender Announcement

**Reference:** PW-22-01016278
**Solicitation Number:** W2023-R002F/A
**Publication Date:** December 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2022, 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified suppliers to prequalify for rail transportation services in support of Exercise MAPLE RESOLVE 23. The objective is to facilitate rail movements of oversized military equipment such as vehicles, trailers, and containers.

### Eligibility and Participation

To participate, suppliers must submit a prequalification application in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Invitation to Qualify (ITQ). Only qualified suppliers will be permitted to participate and bid on any subsequent solicitation issued as part of the procurement process.

### Notice Type and Evaluation Criteria

The procurement process will be conducted as an Invitation to Qualify, where suppliers are invited to prequalify. The selection criteria will be based on factors to be specified in the subsequent solicitation documents.

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

The Invitation to Qualify is open to suppliers who are registered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and are willing to provide services within Canada.

### Contact Information and Confirmations

Queries regarding this Invitation to Qualify should be directed to the Contracting Authority:

* Name: Andrew Desrochers
* Email: [TransportationContracting@forces.gc.ca](mailto:TransportationContracting@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not specified
* Fax: Not specified

Note: The Invitation to Qualify includes an MS Word version of Annex B. Interested suppliers can request a copy by emailing the contracting authority.

### Documents

The Invitation to Qualify documents can be accessed online at the following links:

* [ITQ W2023-R002F/A (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/aa9cdd0b9db8f1ba637f83f1917243bc/invitation_to_qualify_w2023-r002f-a_-_en.pdf)
* [ITQ W2023-R002F/A (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/f15a263e6a171546a5672029642503b2/invitation_a_se_qual
